destinations.title: Explore Turkey's Top Destinations
destinations.subtitle: From ancient ruins to natural wonders, discover the diverse beauty of Turkey

istanbul.name: Istanbul
istanbul.description: Where East meets West - explore ancient mosques, palaces, and bustling bazaars
istanbul.attractions: Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace

cappadocia.name: Cappadocia
cappadocia.description: Fairy chimneys, hot air balloons, and underground cities in a magical landscape
cappadocia.attractions: Hot Air Balloons, Goreme, Underground Cities, Cave Hotels

ephesus.name: Ephesus
ephesus.description: Walk through one of the best-preserved ancient cities in the Mediterranean
ephesus.attractions: Library of Celsus, Grand Theater, Temple of Artemis

pamukkale.name: Pamukkale
pamukkale.description: Natural thermal springs and stunning white travertine terraces

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon

comingSoon.contact: Contact us to arrange custom daily tours in Istanbul, Cappadocia, Ephesus, and beyond.

kusadasiInfo.title: Important Information for Kusadasi - Izmir Daily Tours
kusadasiInfo.item1: All SIC (Seat in Coach) Tours are operational everyday between 15th April ‚Äì 15th October, except Pergamon Acropol ‚Äì operates on Tuesday ‚Äì Saturday on SIC (Seat in Coach) basis
kusadasiInfo.item2: During the tours, the pickups & drop offs from airports require arrivals no later than 08:30 am, departures no earlier than 20:00 hrs
kusadasiInfo.item3: All tours are accompanied by a Professional English-Speaking Tour Guide, any other language will be charged separately and operated on PVT (Private) basis only
kusadasiInfo.item4: Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese will require EUR 100.- / per tour
kusadasiInfo.item5: All tours will be operated with A/C Deluxe Mercedes Sprinter or same category vehicles
kusadasiInfo.item6: All entrance fees, parking fees, toll fees as per following itineraries are included in the given prices
kusadasiInfo.item7: All Full Day Tours are inclusive of local lunch
kusadasiInfo.item8: 70% no-show applied to tour and transfer cancellations within 24 hours to departure
kusadasiInfo.item9: All clients arriving to Izmir airport and depart directly for tours, need to pay EUR 20.- / per person / supplement cost / one way
kusadasiInfo.item10: Pick up times will be given one day prior to departure by our office

whatsIncluded.title: What's Included in Our Daily Tours
whatsIncluded.description: Explore the best attractions with our daily guided tours. Whether you're looking for a historical walking tour of Istanbul, a hot air balloon ride in Cappadocia, or a boat excursion along the Turkish coast, our daily tours provide memorable experiences with expert local guides.
